articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Niger
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Niger
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Aichatou Mindaoudou, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Niger, on Sept. 5 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Niger.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in various fields in the future, too and wished her good health and happiness and success in her work.

articles.title: Goat Milk Products Available
articles.content:
Goat Milk Products Available
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kefir and other goat milk products are available in roast goat-meat restaurants in different parts of Pyongyang.
					 Choe Yun Hui, manager of the Kefir Shop under the Commercial Management Department of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, said that its district branch shops provide people with fresh goat milk products and increase their assortments to improve their dietary life.
					
					 The Roast Goat-meat Restaurant in Puksong-dong No. 1, Phyongchon District, serves ten-odd dishes such as kefir, cheese, roast meat with kefir juice, fried food mixed with cheese, fried potato and bread flour and goat-meat ball.
					
					 The kefir branch shops in all districts are teeming with customers of all ages.
					
					 Kefir stands come into being in streets of the capital to present a new scene this summer.
					
					 The goat milk products are good especially for the children as they are tasty, highly nutritive and rich in phosphorus.
					
					 The kefir stands set up under the popular policy of the government are conducive to the improvement of working people's dietary life.

articles.title: Popular Carbonated Fruit Juice Powder
articles.content:
Popular Carbonated Fruit Juice Powder
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Foodstuff Processing Factory of Pyongyang is producing quality carbonated fruit juice powder of various kinds.
					 The factory has developed a new type of carbonic acid gas collector and settled technological problems arising in all processes from processing, mixture and drying of raw materials to the packing of goods and thus put the technological process of manufacturing carbonated fruit juice powder on a higher scientific basis. And it succeeded in producing various kinds of carbonated fruit juice powder by an industrial method. 
					
					 The percentage of carbonic acid gas contained in the carbonated fruit juice powder is more than three times that of the preceding one. The new one emits gas continuously so that it can keep fresh taste for hours.
					
					 The juice powder is winning great popularity among the drinkers as its aroma and color are equal to those of bottled carbonated fruit juice.

articles.title: Soldiers and People Are Harmonious Whole in DPRK
articles.content:
Soldiers and People Are Harmonious Whole in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Today the soldiers and people of the DPRK form inseparable ties as a harmonious whole.
					The people are treating the soldiers as their real children or brothers and devoting themselves to them and the latter dedicating their youth and lives for the country and people. This is the true feature of the DPRK.
					
					The Pyongyang City People's Committee has assisted the army with all sincerity on more than 110 occasions over last ten-odd years.
					
					The employees of the Kangryong County Commercial Agency in South Hwanghae Province are taking warm care of the life of soldiers, regarding it as a due obligation of the citizens in the Songun era to support the army.
					
					The ranks of those who are assisting the army both materially and morally are increasing day by day. Among them are the officials and employees of the Academy of Medical Science and Pyongyang Noodle House.
					
					Under the slogan of "Let's Help the People!" the soldiers are bringing the beautiful trait of helping the people into full bloom not only at their defence posts but also socialist construction sites.
					
					Many soldiers are powerfully inspiring the working people of factories and farmers in the areas where they are stationed and taking warm care of the life of war veterans and disabled soldiers.
					
					The soldiers dispatched to the construction site of the Huichon Power Station are making a breakthrough in the project in defiance of raging water, shouting "Let us undertake both the socialist construction and national defence!" 
					
					Soldiers rescued people from drowning at the risk of their lives and facelifted nurseries and kindergartens. Besides, there are many facts showing such noble spiritual world of the revolutionary army.
					
					Edifices named after words "army-people" including "army-people power station", "army-people street" and "army-people botanical garden" are being constructed in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Great Unity of Whole Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Great Unity of Whole Nation
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The cause of national reunification necessarily requires the great unity of the whole nation as it is a nationwide cause which can neither be achieved by the efforts of any of the north and south sides alone nor by the efforts of any specified class or stratum alone. 
					 The Koreans can never achieve national reunification and the prosperity common to the nation if they remain standing in confrontation, divided into the north and the south as ever under such complicated situation as now.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The more pressing national reunification becomes and the greater obstacles and difficulties lie in its way and the more serious the situation gets, the higher all the Koreans should hold the banner of great national unity and the more sincerely they should dedicate themselves to the patriotic struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The spirit of loving the country and the nation and the national sentiment peculiar to the Korean nation and the noble idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration constitute an ideological and moral basis of the great unity of the whole nation and motive power for it.
					
					  There is no change in the will of the Workers' Party of Korea to unite and go hand in hand with whoever stands for national reunification with national conscience in the same ranks standing for the great national unity.
					
					 The north, south and overseas sides should strengthen their solidarity and alliance in the actions to support and implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 It is necessary for all political parties, organizations and Koreans from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad to conduct dynamic joint actions, supporting and solidarizing with one another in the struggle to implement the inter-Korean declarations and thus strengthen the tripartite solidarity and alliance among the three sides and promote national concord and unity.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Leader Issues Statement on DPRK Birthday
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Leader Issues Statement on DPRK Birthday 
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, released a statement on Sept. 6 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 He said in the statement that President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, a truly independent and sovereign state in which the popular masses have become the master of the country and developed it into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, thereby setting a shining example of the nation-building. The immortal exploits performed by the President will remain shining forever, he added.
					
					The DPRK has advanced, unfazed by all sorts of challenges of the imperialists and trials, and greeted a new heyday of building of a thriving socialist nation as it is led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, an outstanding statesman and iron-willed commander, he noted.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the just cause of socialist Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-DPRK Friendship Association issued a bulletin on Sept. 4 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					The bulletin in an article titled "Birthday of the DPRK commemorated" noted that President
						 Kim Il Sung convened the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organisations in North and South Korea in Pyongyang in April 1948 and clarified the task of the Korean people to establish a unified democratic government representing the whole of Korea.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was elected as the premier of the DPRK Cabinet and the head of state at the first session of the Supreme People's Assembly and he announced the founding of the DPRK to the whole world.
					
					 Over the past more than six decades the DPRK has overcome a lot of trials and difficulties including war, blockade and moves for aggression and turned into a socialist power which settles everything by itself, unfazed by any threat. 
					
					The bulletin in an article titled "Steady victory of Songun politics" said that General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il met former U.S. president Bill Clinton and his party who visited the DPRK, adding that this visit paid by the former U.S. president to the DPRK in the absence of the diplomatic relations between the two countries represents the victory of the DPRK's foreign policy based on the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also introduced in detail the achievements made by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Switzerland, Bulgaria and Peru between Sept. 2 and 5 to mark the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-DPRK Committee referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung achieved the historical cause of liberating the country, putting an end to the Japanese imperialist colonial rule and set up a genuine country of the people on the land of Korea.
					
					The DPRK is now shedding its rays as the fortress of socialism, he said, adding that this was ascribable to the wise guidance of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK will remain Kim Il Sung's Korea and Kim Jong Il's Korea in the future, too, and the Korean people will certainly achieve the cause of national reunification under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration in the near future, he noted.
					
					 He said that the committee would join the world progressive people in conducting brisker activities supporting the Korean people in their just cause. 
					
					 The secretary-general of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said the DPRK is a genuine socialist state centered on the popular masses as it has fully embodied the great Juche idea fathered by the President in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 He expressed belief that the heroic Korean people would certainly build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the cause of national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings in Switzerland and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by Hekadaha Printing and Publishing Co. of Indonesia on Sept. 4.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Jordan and Iceland
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Jordan and Iceland
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Jordanian preparatory committee and the Icelandic preparatory committee were separately formed on Sept. 3 and 4 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan, and Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees respectively.
					
					 The committees decided to widely introduce the immortal idea and exploits of the President and conduct a dynamic movement for solidarity with the Korean people till 2012.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a lograr la unidad pannacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a lograr la unidad pannacional
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La causa de reunificacion de Corea es la de toda la nacion que no se puede cumplir con las fuerzas de una parte o una clase y estrato determinados del Norte y el Sur. 
					Por esta razon, la gran unidad pannacional deviene la condicion sine qua non para cumplir esa causa.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este viernes y continua:
					
					Si la nacion coreana sigue enfrentandose dividida en el norte y el sur bajo la complicada situacion de hoy, no le sera posible lograr la reunificacion de la patria y la coprosperidad nacional.
					
					Cada vez que se torne mas apremiante la reunificacion de la patria, se incrementen dificultades en el camino para cumplir esta causa y se agrave la situacion interna y externa, todos los coreanos deben levantar a lo mas alto la bandera de gran unidad nacional y dedicarse por entero a la lucha patriotica por alcanzar la reunificacion.
					
					El espiritu de amor por la patria y la nacion y la idiosincrasia de la nacion coreana y el noble ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" presentado en la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre sirven de base ideo-espiritual y motor de la gran unidad pannacional.
					
					Sigue invariable la voluntad del PTC de estrechar la mano con cualquier hombre, que aspire a la reunificacion de la patria partiendo de su conciencia nacionalista, y luchar con el por la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Hay que fortalecer la solidaridad y la alianza tripartitas entre el Norte, el Sur y los compatriotas en ultramar en la lucha por apoyar y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Todos los partidos politicos, entidades y connacionales de distintos sectores y capas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben apoyarse mutuamente y coordinar las acciones en la lucha por implementar dichas declaraciones.
					
					En este curso, han de consolidar la solidaridad y la alianza entre si y fomentar la armonia y la unidad nacionales.

articles.title: Se suministran a los capitalinos productos de leche de cabra
articles.content:
Se suministran a los capitalinos productos de leche de cabra
 Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Los restaurantes especializados en la carne de cabra asada, distribuidos en muchas partes de esta capital, venden tambien kefir y otros productos elaborados con la leche de ese animal vegetariano.
					  Segun Choe Yun Hui, gerente del centro de venta de kefir adscrito a la Direccion Administrativa del Comercio del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, las sucursales de su centro establecidas en cada municipio venden frescos productos lacteos de cabra y dan buen impulso a los quehaceres para aumentar sus variedades a fin de mejorar la vida alimentaria del pueblo.
					
					  En particular, el restaurante situado en el barrio Puksong No. 1 del municipio de Phyongchon oferta mas de 10 platos incluyendo el kefir, el queso, la carne asada con kefir, la papa frita con queso y harina de pan, la albondiga frita de la carne de cabra.
					
					  Las sucursales de la venta de kefir estan repletas siempre de los compradores desde los ancianos hasta los ninos.
					
					  Esos productos lacteos son muy sabrosos y nutritivos, y, en particular, constituyen el alimento ideal para los ninos porque contienen abundante fosforo.
					
					  Los puestos de venta de kefir, producto de la politica popular del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, contribuyen mucho a la mejora de la vida alimentaria de los trabajadores.

articles.title: Se produce en Corea jugo de frutas en polvo de optima calidad
articles.content:
Se produce en Corea jugo de frutas en polvo de optima calidad
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la Fabrica de Procesamiento de Alimentos Taedonggang de Pyongyang acabo de desarrollar el jugo carbonato de frutas en polvo de excelente calidad. 
					Gracias al desarrollo del nuevo colector del gas carbonico y a la solucion de los problemas tecnicos surgidos en la elaboracion y combinacion de materias primas, la secada y el embalaje del jugo en polvo, se ha mejorado la base cientifica del proceso de su produccion 
					
					Ya se logro la industrializacion de varios tipos de ese producto. 
					
					El grado de saturacion del gas carbonico es mas de tres veces que antes. 
					
					El jugo preparado con el nuevo polvo mantiene por largo tiempo su sabor fresco y gaseoso porque la emision del gas dentro de este liquido no se produce de modo instantaneo sino de manera sostenida.
					
					Crece cada vez mas el numero de los consumidores de los refrescos hechos con ese polvo que tienen el mismo olor y color que los jugos embotellados.

articles.title: Conmemoran en Suiza, Bulgaria y Peru dia de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Conmemoran en Suiza, Bulgaria y Peru dia de fundacion de RPDC
 Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar del dia 2 al 5 en Suiza, Bulgaria y el Peru los mitines dedicados al 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En las ocasiones hubo discursos.
					
					  El presidente del Comite Suiza-Corea dijo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria acabando con el coloniaje del imperialismo japones y edifico en Corea un verdadero pais del pueblo.
					
					  Enfatizo que Corea brilla en el mundo como baluarte del socialismo gracias a la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia        Kim Jong Il.
					
					Continuo que en el futuro tambien, Corea seguira brillando con los nombres de Kim Il Sung y de
						 Kim Jong Il y el pueblo coreano cumplira sin falta en un futuro cercano la causa de reunificacion del pais bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					  Agrego que dinamizaria junto con los pueblos progresistas del mundo las actividades solidarias con la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					  El secretario general de la Asociacion de Amistad Bulgaria-Corea senalo que Corea, donde esta materializada perfectamente en todos los dominios de la vida social la gran idea Juche creada por el Presidente, es el verdadero Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares.
					
					  Expreso la conviccion de que bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, el heroico pueblo coreano construira sin falta una gran potencia prospera y alcanzara la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  En los conclaves efectuados en Suiza y Bulgaria fueron aprobados los mensajes de felicitacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
